revision.text: {{Wad| name = Zombi Outbreak | author = [[User:Cutman|Cutman]] | port = GZDoom | iwad = Doom2 | type = s | status = Released | link = {{idgames|id=15130}} }} == About == Zombi Outbreak is an experimental wad created by Cutman to attempt to make a "siege" style level for ZDoom. The aim of the wad is to stay in your cabin while hordes of zombies attempt to break in through the doors and windows. Eventually a helicopter will show up and you can escape. It appears to be one of the first wads to use animated GZDoom models. == External Links == *[http://gothic.34sp.com/pub/doomwads/zombi.zip Download from Cutman's server]
